Introducing Hyde

28 Dec 2013 Hyde is not a brazen two-column [Jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com) theme that pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. It's based on [Poole](http://getpoole.com), the Jekyll butler.

Example content

07 Feb 2012 This blog post shows a few different types of content that's supported and styled with Hyde. Basic typography, images, and code are all supported.

What's Jekyll?

06 Feb 2012 What the hell is Jekyll? No
